projects.name: NotePro V2
projects.description: NotePro 2.0 is a user-friendly web-based note-taking app built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Inspired by Google Keep, it provides intuitive note creation, editing, archiving, and deletion.

projects.name: Budget Tracker
projects.description: BudgetTracker is an application which helps track expenses and earnings, built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

projects.name: Todo List
projects.description: To do list App with CRUD operations and Drag and drop functionality.

projects.name: Random Joke Generator
projects.description: Developed an interactive application using API integration in JavaScript, providing users with a fun experience of generating random jokes and speaking them aloud upon clicking.
